meanings.definition: To distribute or send out information or documents to a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The office circularized the new policy to all employees.
meanings.sent2: She circularized the invitations to her birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The teacher circularized the test results, causing excitement among the students.
meanings.sent4: The rumor quickly circularized around the school.
meanings.sent5: The news was circularized to the entire town within minutes.

meanings.definition: Made in the shape of a circle.
meanings.sent1: The circularized table fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The room had a circularized rug that tied the decor together.
meanings.sent3: The circularized cake looked like a giant donut.
meanings.sent4: The circularized window provided a panoramic view of the city.
meanings.sent5: The circularized design of the logo was eye-catching and modern.

meanings.definition: To make something circular in shape.
meanings.sent1: He circularized the dough before placing it in the oven.
meanings.sent2: The artist circularized the painting to give it a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The chef circularized the pancake, making it look like a perfect circle.
meanings.sent4: She circularized the garden path for a more harmonious flow.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor circularized the clay into a beautiful vase.
